Greetings mr Howard

I don't know any wargame with samurai as a central theme.
But if ye like old RPG games, ye can find a very simmilar thing if ye search
for

The Oriental Adventures
(AD&D) First Edition

An suport book to Advanced Dungeons and Dragons First Edition.

There is samurai to play, ninjas, shugenjas (there is written erroneously as
shukenja), martial arts monks, clerical monks (such as the ones from
Shingonshu) called there as Sohei, kenseis (like Miyamoto Musashi, etc

And in ADD rules, ye can with miniatures, play an adventure or set up an
adventure to play just like an strategical wargaming. :-)

I hope it helps

Octavio Augusto Okimoto Alves de Carvalho
S�o Paulo - Brazil
